intro: Psychotria bataanensis, commonly known as Bataan Psychotria, is a flowering plant species native to the Philippines. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and undergrowth. Psychotria bataanensis is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and potential ecological significance in its native habitat.
